Class ApplicationDetails

java.lang.Object
com.atu.green_global_initiative_api.model.dao.ApplicationDetails
@Entity public class ApplicationDetails extends Object
This class represents the entity for the application details in the Green Global Initiative API. It maps to the "application_details" table in the database and contains information about the application, including the organization, application status, funding request, project description, and admin comments.
